key.name: last-panel
key.summary: The name of the last opened panel
key.description: The identifier for the last Settings panel that was opened. Unrecognised values will be ignored and the welcome panel used instead.

key.name: enable-conf-tweaks
key.summary: Whether to parse and display Configurable Tweaks
key.description: Controls whether support for Configurable Tweaks is enabled or not. If enabled, the directory specified by the tweaks-data-dir build option will be searched for YAML files which then will be parsed and if successful any additional settings from those files will be added to the application. See src/conf-tweaks/README.md for more documentation.
